description: Advanced image block with parallax scroll, reveal animations, SVG masks, filters, and FancyBox lightbox

examples.name: Basic Responsive Image with Caption
examples.description: Simple responsive image with text caption and link
examples.visualDescription: 800px wide centered image with 'Photo credit: John Doe' caption below, clickable link to full size

attributes.ariaLabel: Beautiful landscape photo of mountains at sunset

examples.useCase: Blog post images, portfolio galleries, article illustrations, basic image with attribution

responsiveNotes.ImgWidth: Responsive max width (800px desktop, 600px tablet, 100% mobile)
responsiveNotes.Alignment: center aligns image horizontally within container
responsiveNotes.ImgSize: WordPress image size (thumbnail, medium, large, full) - large = 1024px default
responsiveNotes.calculation: ImgWidth sets max-width, image scales down to fit container

captionNotes.ImgCaption: Text string (supports HTML tags for links: ...author...)
captionNotes.floatAlign: none (caption below), left/right (float image with text wrap)
captionNotes.accessibility: Caption provides context for screen readers, use descriptive text

examples.name: Scroll Reveal Animation (Purple Wipe from Left)
examples.description: Image reveals with purple color overlay animating from left to right on scroll into viewport
examples.visualDescription: Purple overlay slides from left revealing image beneath, dramatic entrance animation triggered by scroll
examples.useCase: Feature sections, hero images, product showcases, dramatic page entrances, landing pages

scrollRevealNotes.ScrollRevelImg: Triggers color overlay wipe animation on scroll into viewport (Intersection Observer)
scrollRevealNotes.AnimBgColor: Overlay color that animates across image (brand color recommended, #667eea purple)
scrollRevealNotes.timing: Animation triggers when element enters viewport (50% visible threshold)
scrollRevealNotes.duration: Fixed 1.5s animation duration (not configurable, smooth reveal)
scrollRevealNotes.playOnce: Animation plays once per page load (doesn't repeat on scroll up/down)

animDirectionGuide.left: Overlay slides from left edge to right (reveals image left to right)
animDirectionGuide.right: Overlay slides from right edge to left (reveals image right to left)
animDirectionGuide.top: Overlay slides from top edge to bottom (reveals image top to bottom)
animDirectionGuide.bottom: Overlay slides from bottom edge to top (reveals image bottom to top)
animDirectionGuide.bestPractice: Use 'left' for LTR languages, 'right' for RTL, 'top' for vertical reveals

examples.name: Parallax Scroll Effect (Vertical Movement)
examples.description: Image moves vertically at different speed than page scroll creating depth illusion
examples.visualDescription: Image scrolls slower than page creating parallax depth effect, 120px vertical travel distance
examples.useCase: Hero sections, full-width backgrounds, feature images, depth effects, modern designs

parallaxNotes.ScrollParallax: Enables parallax scroll effect (image moves at different rate than page)
parallaxNotes.ScrollMoveX: Horizontal movement in px (positive = moves right on scroll down, negative = left)
parallaxNotes.ScrollMoveY: Vertical movement in px (positive = moves down on scroll down, recommended 80-200px)
parallaxNotes.calculation: ScrollMoveY: 120px means image travels 120px vertically as you scroll past it
parallaxNotes.speed: Larger values = more dramatic parallax (50px subtle, 200px dramatic)
parallaxNotes.imageSize: Use tall images (1.5x container height) for smooth parallax without empty space

parallaxBestPractices.verticalOnly: Set ScrollMoveX: '0' for pure vertical parallax (most common, feels natural)
parallaxBestPractices.imageHeight: Image should be taller than container by ScrollMoveY amount (container 600px + 120px move = 720px image minimum)
parallaxBestPractices.performance: Uses CSS transform (GPU accelerated, smooth 60fps on modern devices)
parallaxBestPractices.mobile: Disable on mobile (ScrollParallax: false via responsive settings) to improve performance

examples.name: Hover Scroll Effect (Tall Image in Fixed Height Container)
examples.description: Tall image scrolls inside fixed-height container on hover, revealing full content
examples.visualDescription: 500px tall container with 1500px tall image inside, hover to smoothly scroll from top to bottom in 3 seconds

attributes.ImgCaption: Hover to scroll and see full content

examples.useCase: Website screenshots, mobile app mockups, long infographics, vertical content previews

hoverScrollNotes.ScrollImgEffect: Enables hover-triggered scroll animation for tall images
hoverScrollNotes.ScrollImgHeight: Container min-height in px (400-600px typical, fixed viewport)
hoverScrollNotes.ScrollTransDur: Scroll animation duration in seconds (2-5s recommended, longer for taller images)
hoverScrollNotes.calculation: Image 1500px tall in 500px container with 3s duration = smooth 1000px scroll over 3 seconds
hoverScrollNotes.trigger: Hover on desktop scrolls from top to bottom, hover off returns to top
hoverScrollNotes.mobile: Touch devices: Use shorter duration (2s) since touch doesn't trigger hover reliably

imageSizeGuide.ratio: Image should be 2-4x taller than container (500px container → 1000-2000px image)
imageSizeGuide.tooTall: >4x ratio makes scroll too fast even with max duration (5s limit)
imageSizeGuide.tooShort: <2x ratio doesn't provide enough scrollable content (use regular image instead)
imageSizeGuide.recommended: 3x ratio with 3s duration = comfortable scroll speed (500px container → 1500px image)

examples.name: SVG Mask Shape (Hexagon with Drop Shadow)
examples.description: Image clipped to hexagon shape with custom SVG mask and drop shadow filter
examples.visualDescription: Hexagonal cropped image with subtle drop shadow, modern geometric presentation

attributes.ariaLabel: Team member John Doe profile photo

examples.useCase: Team member photos, profile images, geometric designs, modern portfolios, creative layouts

maskImageNotes.showMaskImg: Enables SVG mask clipping (CSS mask-image property)
maskImageNotes.MaskImg.url: SVG mask file path (must be valid SVG with <mask> element)
maskImageNotes.commonShapes: Circle, hexagon, star, blob, wave, custom logo shapes
maskImageNotes.imageRequirements: Use square images (1:1 aspect ratio) for symmetric shapes to avoid distortion
maskImageNotes.browserSupport: Modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge). IE11 shows rectangular fallback.

maskShadowNotes.typeShadow: drop-shadow (filter effect, follows mask shape) vs box-shadow (rectangular)
maskShadowNotes.advantage: drop-shadow respects mask shape (hexagon shadow vs square shadow)
maskShadowNotes.MaskShadow: Applies drop-shadow filter to masked image (shadow follows hexagon/circle/custom shape)
maskShadowNotes.horizontal: X offset in px (0 = centered, positive = right, negative = left)
maskShadowNotes.vertical: Y offset in px (0 = centered, positive = down, negative = up)
maskShadowNotes.blur: Blur radius in px (8-16px typical for soft shadow, 2-4px for sharp)
maskShadowNotes.color: RGBA color with transparency (0.2-0.4 alpha for subtle, 0.5-0.8 for strong)

svgMaskCreation.designTool: Create in Illustrator/Figma, export as SVG
svgMaskCreation.whiteFill: White areas = visible image, black areas = transparent (mask convention)
svgMaskCreation.optimization: Use SVGO to optimize SVG (<5KB ideal), remove unnecessary attributes

examples.name: CSS Filters (Grayscale to Color on Hover)
examples.description: Image starts grayscale, transitions to full color on hover with smooth animation
examples.visualDescription: 100% grayscale image, hover reveals full color with smooth 0.4s transition, modern portfolio effect
examples.useCase: Portfolio grids, image galleries, hover effects, modern interactive designs, project showcases

cssFiltersNotes.otherFilters: blur (0-20px), brightness (0-200%), contrast (0-200%), saturate (0-200%), sepia (0-100%), hue-rotate (0-360deg)

filterCombinations.grayscaleToColor: Normal: grayscale 100, Hover: grayscale 0 (classic portfolio effect)
filterCombinations.fadedToVibrant: Normal: brightness 70 + saturate 50, Hover: brightness 100 + saturate 150 (dramatic color pop)
filterCombinations.vintageEffect: Normal: sepia 60 + contrast 120, Hover: sepia 0 + contrast 100 (retro to modern)
filterCombinations.subtleGlow: Normal: brightness 100, Hover: brightness 110 + contrast 105 (slight enhancement)

examples.name: FancyBox Lightbox Gallery
examples.description: Clickable image opens in full-screen FancyBox lightbox with navigation arrows and captions
examples.visualDescription: Click image to open full-screen lightbox overlay, dark background, close button, arrow navigation for galleries

attributes.ariaLabel: Gallery photo 1 - Click to view full size

examples.useCase: Photo galleries, portfolio projects, product images, detailed views, image collections

fancyBoxNotes.fancyBox: Enables FancyBox lightbox popup on click (overrides link.url if set)
fancyBoxNotes.FancyOption: JSON string with FancyBox configuration options
fancyBoxNotes.loop: true = navigate from last to first image in gallery
fancyBoxNotes.arrows: true = show left/right arrow navigation (for multiple images)
fancyBoxNotes.infobar: true = show image counter at top (1/5, 2/5, etc.)
fancyBoxNotes.thumbs: true = show thumbnail strip at bottom for quick navigation
fancyBoxNotes.transitionEffect: slide (default), fade, circular, tube, zoom-in-out, rotate (how images transition)

fancyOptionJSON.format: Must be valid JSON array with single object: [{...options...}]
fancyOptionJSON.escaping: Double quotes must be escaped in JSON string
fancyOptionJSON.validation: Invalid JSON breaks FancyBox, test in browser console: JSON.parse(string)

gallerySetup.multipleImages: Place multiple tp-creative-image blocks with fancyBox: true adjacent to each other
gallerySetup.autoGrouping: FancyBox auto-detects and groups adjacent lightbox images into gallery
gallerySetup.navigation: arrows + thumbs provide two navigation methods (arrows = sequential, thumbs = jump)
gallerySetup.captions: Image alt text becomes FancyBox caption (set in WordPress media library)

examples.name: Combined Effects (Parallax + Filter + Border Hover)
examples.description: Image with parallax scroll, color filter, and animated border/shadow on hover - multiple effects combined
examples.visualDescription: Parallax scrolling image with slight sepia tone, border thickens and shadow intensifies on hover, gradient border effect
examples.useCase: Premium feature sections, hero images, high-impact visuals, branded content, interactive landing pages

combinedEffectsNotes.parallax: Subtle 80px vertical movement (not too dramatic, works with other effects)
combinedEffectsNotes.filters: Slight sepia 20 + contrast 110 creates warm vintage look, hover removes for modern reveal
combinedEffectsNotes.border: Normal gray 3px → Hover purple 5px (thicker border draws attention)
combinedEffectsNotes.shadow: Normal subtle → Hover colored brand shadow (purple glow effect)

performanceNotes.filters: CSS filters are GPU accelerated on modern browsers
performanceNotes.shadows: box-shadow can be expensive, limit to <10 images with hover shadows per page
performanceNotes.borderRadius: Animating border-radius triggers layout recalculation (minor performance impact)
performanceNotes.mobile: Consider disabling parallax on mobile (ScrollParallax: false) for better performance

effects.ScrollRevelImg: Color overlay wipe animation on scroll into viewport (left/right/top/bottom)
effects.ScrollParallax: Image moves at different speed than page scroll (depth illusion)
effects.ScrollImgEffect: Tall image scrolls inside fixed container on hover (screenshot preview)
effects.showMaskImg: SVG mask clipping to custom shapes (circle, hexagon, blob)
effects.CSS filters: Grayscale, blur, brightness, contrast, sepia, saturation effects

interactivity.fancyBox: Full-screen lightbox popup with gallery navigation
interactivity.link: Clickable image linking to URL (overridden by fancyBox if enabled)
interactivity.hoverStates: Border, shadow, filter, and border-radius transitions on hover

responsiveStrategy.ImgWidth: Set max-width per breakpoint (md/sm/xs) in px or % units
responsiveStrategy.disableEffects: Disable parallax/hover scroll on mobile for performance

validationRules.SelectImg.url: Required, image file path or URL
validationRules.ScrollRevelImg: Requires AnimBgColor and AnimDirection when true
validationRules.ScrollParallax: Requires ScrollMoveX and ScrollMoveY values (numbers as strings)
validationRules.ScrollImgEffect: Requires ScrollImgHeight (responsive object) and ScrollTransDur when true
validationRules.showMaskImg: Requires MaskImg.url (SVG file path) when true
validationRules.fancyBox: Requires FancyOption (JSON string) when true, overrides link.url
validationRules.imgNFilter/imgHFilter: Requires openFilter: true to enable filter object
validationRules.ariaLabel: Recommended for accessibility when image is clickable or conveys important info

warnings: fancyBox: true overrides link.url - image opens in lightbox instead of navigating to link
ScrollParallax requires tall image (container height + ScrollMoveY) to avoid white space at bottom
ScrollImgEffect requires image 2-4x taller than ScrollImgHeight for smooth scroll effect
SVG masks (showMaskImg) only work in modern browsers - IE11 shows rectangular fallback
CSS filter transitions can be GPU intensive on mobile - test performance on target devices
FancyOption must be valid JSON string - invalid JSON breaks lightbox functionality
ScrollRevelImg animation plays once per page load - doesn't repeat on scroll up
Combining multiple effects (parallax + filters + masks) can impact performance on low-end devices
MaskShadow drop-shadow filter is more expensive than box-shadow - use sparingly on pages with many images
AnimDirection must be 'left', 'right', 'top', or 'bottom' - other values break animation
ScrollMoveY value should be proportional to container height (100-200px for 600px container)
floatAlign 'left'/'right' with showCaption creates text wrap - test layout doesn't break on mobile
commonMistakes: Using ScrollParallax with image same height as container (no vertical movement visible)
Setting ScrollImgHeight larger than image height (no scrollable content, defeats purpose)
Forgetting to set AnimBgColor when enabling ScrollRevelImg (overlay is transparent/invisible)
Using non-square images with circular SVG masks (image appears distorted/cropped awkwardly)
Setting FancyOption to malformed JSON (missing quotes, brackets) breaking lightbox
Using very high filter values (blur: 50, saturate: 300) creating unnatural effects
Enabling fancyBox without setting ariaLabel for accessibility (screen readers can't describe action)
Not testing hover effects on touch devices (hover doesn't work reliably on mobile)
Setting ScrollTransDur too short (<1s) for tall images (scroll feels too fast)
Using parallax on background images without overflow: hidden on container (image scrolls out of bounds)
bestPractices: Always set ariaLabel for images that are clickable or convey important information (WCAG 2.4.4)
Use ImgSize 'large' or 'medium' instead of 'full' for web performance (<500KB images)
Set responsive ImgWidth (px on md/sm, % on xs) for mobile optimization
For parallax: Use ScrollMoveY 80-150px for subtle effect, 200-300px for dramatic
For hover scroll: Use ScrollTransDur 2-4s (2s for short images, 4s for very tall)
Use grayscale filter for portfolio grids (100 → 0 on hover) for modern interactive feel
Combine subtle filters (sepia 20 + contrast 110) instead of extreme values for refined look
Use drop-shadow with masks instead of box-shadow (shadow follows shape, not rectangle)
Group FancyBox images by placing blocks adjacent - auto-creates gallery with navigation
Set loop: true in FancyOption for galleries with 3+ images (seamless navigation)
Use showCaption for attribution, credits, or context (important for stock photos, client work)
Disable parallax on mobile (ScrollParallax: false) to improve performance and prevent jank
Test combined effects on mid-range devices - smooth on desktop doesn't guarantee smooth on mobile
accessibilityNotes: ariaLabel is REQUIRED for clickable images to describe action ('View project', 'Open gallery', etc.)
Image alt text should be set in WordPress media library (describes image content for screen readers)
showCaption provides visible attribution/context that benefits all users, not just screen readers
fancyBox lightbox must be keyboard navigable (arrows, Esc to close) - built-in by default
link.target '_blank' should include visual indicator (icon) for external links (WCAG 3.2.5)
CSS filters shouldn't remove essential content - ensure text overlays maintain WCAG contrast ratios
Parallax effects should respect prefers-reduced-motion CSS media query (disable for vestibular disorders)
Hover effects should have touch equivalents on mobile (tap to activate, not hover-only content)
FancyBox caption should include image description from alt text (auto-included by block)
performanceConsiderations: Optimize images: JPG at 80% quality, <500KB per image for web (use ImageOptim, TinyPNG)
Parallax: Uses CSS transform (GPU accelerated, minimal performance impact on modern devices)
Scroll reveal: Intersection Observer API (efficient, no scroll event listeners needed)
Hover scroll: CSS background-position transition (smooth, no JavaScript animation loop)
CSS filters: GPU accelerated on modern browsers, slight impact on mobile (test on target devices)
SVG masks: CSS mask-image is performant, no impact on rendering speed
FancyBox: Lazy loads on first click (lightbox library not loaded until needed)
Drop-shadow filter: More expensive than box-shadow (use on <10 images per page)
Border-radius animation: Triggers layout recalculation (minor impact, avoid on 50+ images)
Multiple effects: Parallax + filters + hover = 3-5% CPU on scroll (acceptable, but monitor mobile)
Lazy loading: Enable native lazy loading on images below fold (loading='lazy' attribute)
Responsive images: Use srcset for different screen sizes (WordPress handles automatically with ImgSize)

troubleshooting.cause: Image height same as container height, or ScrollMoveY too small
troubleshooting.solution: Use image 1.5x taller than container, increase ScrollMoveY to 100-200px, check container has overflow: hidden

troubleshooting.cause: Image not tall enough, or ScrollImgHeight larger than image
troubleshooting.solution: Use image 2-4x taller than ScrollImgHeight (500px height → 1500px image minimum)

troubleshooting.cause: FancyOption is invalid JSON, or fancyBox: false
troubleshooting.solution: Validate JSON: [{"loop":true}], ensure fancyBox: true, check browser console for errors

troubleshooting.problem: SVG mask not showing (rectangular image instead)
troubleshooting.cause: Browser doesn't support CSS mask-image (IE11), or invalid SVG
troubleshooting.solution: Test in modern browser (Chrome/Firefox/Safari), validate SVG has <mask> element with white fill

troubleshooting.cause: Element not entering viewport, or ScrollRevelImg: false
troubleshooting.solution: Ensure ScrollRevelImg: true, AnimBgColor set, scroll element into view (50% threshold)

troubleshooting.cause: openFilter: false, or filter values as strings instead of numbers
troubleshooting.solution: Set openFilter: true, use numbers for filter values (grayscale: 100, not '100')

troubleshooting.cause: Different border widths without border-box sizing, or missing normal border
troubleshooting.solution: Set both border and borderHover with same structure, use box-sizing: border-box (automatic)
Set showCaption: true and provide ImgCaption text string
